issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw: This is still happening to me locally 100% of the time. More than half the footsteps placed slide around, and sooner or later that leads to an unexpected collision that makes Val fall. Before grabbing the tool about 1 in 10 footsteps slide around, so it's less likely to fall, but it's still out of our control. This is running off the latest master with PR #100 merged.
